column4: hey i would like some help with getting a USB interface on a PPP ADSL router working, its an alcatel speedtouch 530
i can get it working fine if i use the ethernet port, but i'd really like to keep the ethernet port free for my lan and use the usb port
which is not a satisfying answer
you could get a router so you can use both at the same time (LAN and WEB/WAN)
